name: Heaven service - Wish.Wait.Repair
description:
Glorius an angle who works at Heaven service company and assigned to repairing section, Glorius have to sneak into houses and repair all broken home appliances without getting caught. Luckily he have an ability to hide from house members by turning into a statue. Goodluck!

*Game still have some bugs sorry for that! ;-;

Feature

  • Spikey hair characters
  • 6 levels
  • top-down

Control

WASD - walk

Hold E - repair object

Hold shift - turn into statue
